datasets.name: ds_latency
datasets.query: SELECT payment_solution, avg_latency_ms, transaction_count, approval_rate_pct FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_solution_performance ORDER BY transaction_count DESC

datasets.name: ds_network_latency
datasets.query: SELECT card_network, avg_latency_ms, transaction_count FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_card_network_performance ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
